nodes.text: Temmin Wexley's junk shop was a business created by the junk dealer Temmin Wexley after his mother Norra Wexley left the Outer Rim Territories planet Akiva to fight for the Rebel Alliance. The shop originally served as the home of the Wexley family, and was located in Akiva's capital city of Myrra, one alley away from Master Hyor-ka's dao-ben steamed bun shop. In 4 ABY, Wexley stole a valuable crate from the crime lord Surat Nuat, and hid it in the basement of his shop.
Temmin Wexley's junk shop first appeared in Aftermath, a 2015 novel written by Chuck Wendig.
